fields.value: - Place a layer of spikes outside someone's house, roleblocking all visitors.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
**Spiked Mines** (Requirement: Roleblock 2 non-Monkey attackers)
- You may place a mine outside someone's house, roleblocking and burning all visitors. Burning will deal an astral Basic attack the following night.
- If three or more people visit your target, you will deal a Powerful attack to the target unless they are a Monkey.
- You don't roleblock Astral visitors, but you still burn them and count towards the three-person limit.
**Spike Storm** (Requirement: Roleblock eight visitors)
- You may place spikes outside of five people each night.
- Anyone who is roleblock immune will be dealt a Basic attack instead.
- If you spike someone who is detained, you will attack the detainer.
------------------------------------------------------
- You may only choose one upgrade.
- If you are roleblocked, you will place spikes outside of your own house unless you have Spiked Mines.
- You may self target.
